changeSet.sql: UPDATE nomenclator_attribute SET default_value='EUR', readonly_on_add=TRUE, readonly_on_edit=TRUE WHERE nomenclator_id=(SELECT id FROM nomenclator WHERE code='registru_sepa_eur') and key='attribute2';

changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User1
changeSet.sql: UPDATE nomenclator_attribute SET default_value='RON', readonly_on_add=TRUE, readonly_on_edit=TRUE WHERE nomenclator_id=(SELECT id FROM nomenclator WHERE code='registru_sepa_ron') and key='attribute2';
